item.title: Clue
item.description: Meta-Quiz clue The meta-quiz requires JavaScript to generate the URL of the next page. 1a 1b 2 Complete the listed quizzes to continue to the next part. Status should be automatically updated when a quiz answer is changed. if necessary. Sum Hash All answers of the quizzes are ; you can go to the next part.

item.title: Practice
item.description: Question 1 Depends on: p1/u2/t p1/u2/vt $s\triangle ABC$e has vertices $sA(0, 0)$e , $sB(22, 13)$e , and $sC(14, 14)$e . Note: truncate ($s(\lambda x.\lfloor x\rfloor)$e ) to 5 decimal digits and remove prefix and suffix zeroes. For example, $s\frac{1}{3}$e would become $s0.33333$e . Question 1c (bonus) Quiz 1c (0 marks) The quiz requires JavaScript to automatically validate the answer(s). Determine the centroid of $s\triangle ABC$e , in the form $sG(\frac{a}{b}, \frac{c}{d})$e , where $sG$e is the centroid.
